**mmgpy.metamodel**
*******************

The **metamodel** module provides the surrogate models available for the metamodelling process. Currently supported
regression models are the following.

General regression models
#########################

- Random Forest Regression (RFR) :meth:`metamodel.RandomForestRegression`
- Support Vector Regression (SVR) :meth:`metamodel.SupportVectorRegression`
- Feed Forward Neural Network Regression (FFNNR) :meth:`metamodel.FeedForwardNNRegression`

Series regression models
########################

- Convolutional Neural Network Series Regression (CNNSR)

.. bibliography:: metamodel.bib
    :style: unsrt

.. automodule:: metamodel
   :members:
   :special-members:
